articles.description: The 32-year-old dairy farmer's daughter from Tipperary initially dreamed of becoming a vet, and competed at amateur level while studying equine science at Limerick University,
articles.content: After a historic 2021, which saw Rachael Blackmore become the first woman to win the Grand National, the Irish jockey has done it again, this time getting her hands on the Boodles Cheltenham Gold Cup… [+8562 chars]

articles.author: Nathan Ridley
articles.title: Pep Guardiola sends strong message to Jurgen Klopp as Premier League title race hots up - The Mirror
articles.description: Liverpool are just one point behind table toppers Manchester City in the Premier League title race and Pep Guardiola has issued a response to Jurgen Klopp after being closed down this week
articles.content:
Pep Guardiola has reminded Jurgen Klopp that his Manchester City are still in control of the Premier League title race.

articles.title: Contrasting fortunes for Ronaldo and Rangnick with their Man Utd futures now decided - TEAMtalk
articles.description: One of Cristiano Ronaldo and Ralf Rangnick won't be at Manchester United next season, with a report explaining why change is afoot.
articles.content:
